EnableLengthLimit.label: Limit Definition Length
EnableLengthLimit.tooltip: Definitions can be long, do you want to limit the response to a set length?

LengthLimit.label: Set Length Limit
LengthLimit.tooltip: Limit for length of message in Stream chat. Ever 400 characters is a new message in chat for Twitch. 1795 for Discord.

RapidAPIKey.label: Rapid API Key
RapidAPIKey.tooltip: A Rapid api key is need to access WordAPI and/or Urban Dictionary API.
